full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer

*   **Title (Tender Reference)**: W6897-230068 Arena Maintenance Standing Offer (WS4003422725)
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-05-11
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-30T14:00:00
*   **Procurement Category**: CNST

This tender relates to the provision of maintenance services for the ice plant at Ralston Arena, CFB Suffield. The service covers the repair and maintenance of the mechanical systems and equipment. The works include ice plant start-up, mid-season evaluation services, and year-end shutdown. 

**Selection Criteria**: The Stand Offer will be awarded to the firm offering the lowest price.

**Contract Performance Period**: 2 years with 3 one-year option periods.

### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Required Documents

*   The Bidder must submit required supporting documentation electronically through Ariba. 
*   All required documentation must be submitted by the Tender Closing Date.

Please note that bids submitted after the tender closing date and time will be declared non-compliant and will not be considered for evaluation.

### Tender Description

The maintenance services to be provided on an "as requested basis" are anticipated to require the following:

*   Supply of labour, materials, equipment, and supervisory services for the repair and maintenance of the mechanical systems and equipment
*   Ice plant start-up and shutdown services
*   Mid-season evaluation services

The Maintenance Standing Offer will be issued for a period of 2 years, with 3 subsequent 1-year option periods. The services will include:

*   Repair and maintenance of mechanical systems and equipment in the arena
*   Ice plant start-up and shutdown services
*   Mid-season evaluation services

The contracted services are anticipated to be awarded to one firm.

The Procuring Authority will conduct all evaluations and assessments submitted as part of the request for Standing Offer based on the criteria outlined in the evaluation schedule.
